title: Oriola-KD Corporation's 120,000 A-shares converted into B-shares
content:
(Thomson Reuters ONE via COMTEX) -- 
 
Oriola-KD Corporation Stock Exchange Release 17 September 2015 at 9.30 a.m. In accordance with Section 3 of the Bylaws of Oriola-KD Corporation, 120,000 A-shares have been converted into 120,000 B-shares. The conversion has been entered into the Trade Register on 17 September 2015. After the conversion there are 56,458,452 A-shares and 125,027,761 B-shares in the company. The total number of shares is 181,486,213 and the total number of votes is 1,254,196,801. 

Oriola-KD Corporation 

Petter Sandstrom 

General Counsel 

For further information, please contact:
